thread.title: General crashfeast and other BUG issues

post.author: lowdragon
post.body:
this is some kind of rant so ...

[rant mode on]
I experience a LOT of random crashes within one of my model programs lately. Going through the last 14days was pure horror and it never was that bad.
The funny thing is, it just started after the BETA program was over and the program became a "final". The consequence is that i deleted the "gebrauchspuppe" i was working on (just a private project mind you) :p, because it was that annoying - and i need a new polymodel programm (which is a nice consequence after all:).

Working on a daily basis with this program is not an option or possible and i need to get rid of it ASAP.
If it was hardware and not software i would burn it behind the house!

I dont ask questions if or how someone experienced something like this too - because i dont care nor do i will come up with the name of that program just because it cant and will not stay that way (iam sure since the beta was good).

so long ... may your bloody spawns from your devils meat decay and rot in your bellys and the silver moon shine bright above your heads.
[rant mode off]
